juzs.text: 51|31|Kare wa itta. `Sore de, anata gata no o yoken wa nandesuka, shito no kata gata yo.'
51|32|Kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa tsumibukai min ni tsukawasa reta nodesu.
51|33|Doro no tsubute o (ame no yo ni) kare-ra no ue ni furasu tame ni.
51|34|Ho rachi o tsukusu mono ni taishite,-nushi no omoto de shirusa reta (doro no tsubute o furasou).' To itta.
51|35|Sore kara, ware wa soko ni ita shinja-tachi o tachi noka seyou to shita.
51|36|Shikashi, sono (machi no)-chu de miidashita musurimu no ie wa, tada no ikken dakedeatta.
51|37|Ware wa itamashi chobatsu o, osoreru mono no tame ni hitotsu no shirushi to shite soko ni nokoshita.
51|38|Mata musa ni mo (shirushi ga atta). Ware ga akirakana ken'i o sazukete, kare o firuaun ni tsukawashita toki o omoiokose.
51|39|Kare (firuaun) wa sono kensei o kasa ni, se o muke,`koitsu wa majutsu-shi ka, soretomo kichigaida.' To itta.
51|40|Sorede are wa, kare to sono gunzei o toraete umi ni nagekonda. Hontoni kare wa, ke shikaranu monodeatta.
51|41|Mata ado ni mo (shirushi ga atta). Ware ga sangai o motarasu kaze o kare-ra ni okutta toki o omoiokose.
51|42|Sore wa kare-ra o osotte, subete o kaimetsu shi haikyo no yo ni shite, nani mo nokosanakatta.
51|43|Mata samudo ni mo (shirushi ga atta). `Tsukanoma (no anata gata no nama) o tanoshime.' To iwa reta toki o omoiokoshi nasai.
51|44|Sonotoki kare-ra wa,-nushi no meirei ni ohei ni somuitanode, are yo to mite iru ma ni kaminari ni osowa reta.
51|45|Mohaya kare-ra wa oki noboru koto mo dekizu, mata mamoru koto mo dekinakatta.
51|46|Izen ni mo, nufu no min o (ware wa horoboshita). Hontoni kare-ra wa hangyaku no mindeatta.
51|47|Ware wa iryoku o motte ten o uchi-date, hate shinai hirogari ni shita.
51|48|Mata ware wa daichi o uchi hirogeta. Nanto migoto ni hirogeta koto yo.
51|49|Mata ware wa, subete no mono o ryosei ni tsukutta. Anata gata wa kunkai o ukeirerudearou (to iu hairyo kara).
51|50|`Sorede anata gata wa, arra no higo no shita ni omomuke. Hontoni watashi wa kare kara anata gata ni tsukawasa reta komeina keikoku-shadearu.
51|51|Sore de arra to issho ni soto no kami o tatete wa naranai. Hontoni watashi wa, kare kara anata gata ni tsukawasa reta komeina keikoku-shadearu'.
51|52|Doyo ni kare-ra izen no mono mo, shito ga kare-ra ni yattekuru tabi ni,`majutsu-shi ka, matawa kichigaida.' To itta.
51|53|Kare-ra wa sore o ikun to shite keisho shite kita no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa hogai no mindearu.
51|54|Sore de, kare-ra o sakete sare. Anata gata wa (kare-ra no okonai ni taishite) togame wa nai nodearu.
51|55|Daga kunkai shi nasai. Kunkai wa shinja-tachi o ekisuru.
51|56|Jin to ningen o tsukutta no wa ware ni tsukae saseru tame.
51|57|Ware wa kare-ra ni don'na kate mo motomezu, mata fuyo sa reru koto mo motomenai.
51|58|Hontoni arra koso wa, kate o sadzuke rareru okata, kengonaru iryoku no omode ara reru.
51|59|Akugyo no to no sazukari-bun (batsu) wa, kare-ra no nakama no sazukari-bun (batsu) to onajidearou.Dakara so (ware o) sekitatenakute mo i.
51|60|Shinko shinai mono ni wazawai are. Yakusoku no hi ga kare-ra ni kanarazu yattekuru.
52|1|Kano (keiji no) yama ni kakete (chikau).
52|2|Seizento kakishirusa reta Keisuke ni kakete,
52|3|maka rete inai yohishi ni,
52|4|fudan ni mode rareru seiden ni kakete,
52|5|takaku kakage rareta tengai ni kakete,
52|6|minagiri afureru taiyo ni kakete (chikau).
52|7|Hontoni omo no chobatsu wa kanarazu kudaru.
52|8|Sore wa sake enai.
52|9|Sonohi, ten wa oini yurayura to yure,
52|10|mata yamayama wa yurugi ugokudearou.
52|11|Sonohi,(shinri o) kyogidearu to shita mono ni wazawai are.
52|12|Munashi koto ni tawamurete ita-sha-tachi ni.
52|13|Kare-ra ga (monosugoi chikara de) jigoku no hi no naka ni tsuki otosa reru sonohi,
52|14|(ko iwa reyou. ) `Kore koso wa, anata gataga kyogidearu to shite ita jigoku no gokadearu.
52|15|Kore demo majutsuna no ka. Soretomo anata gata wa, mienai no ka.
52|16|Anata gata wa soko de yaka reruga i. Anata gataga sore o taeshinon demo, shinobanakute mo onaji koto. Anata gataga okonatta koto ni, mukui rareru dakedearu.'
52|17|-Nushi o osoreta-sha-tachi wa kanarazu rakuen no yorokobi no naka ni 置Ri,
52|18|-nushi ga kare-ra ni ataeru mono ni kanki shi, mata omo ga goku hi no chobatsu kara kare-ra o sukuwa reta koto o yorokobu.
52|19|(Kare-ra ni wa iwa reyou. ) `Tanoshinde tabe, katsu nome. Kore mo anata gata no (yoi) okonai no tamedearu.'
52|20|Kare-ra wa narabe rareta sofa ni yorikakari, ware wa utsukushi-me no otome-tachi o kare-ra no haigusha ni surudearou.

52|21|Shinko suru mono-tachi, mata kare-ra ni shitagatta shinjinbukai shison no mono-tachi, ware wa, sorera no mono o (rakuen ni oite) isshonisuru. Kare-ra no subete no koi ni taishi, sukoshi mo (hosho o) keigen shinaidearou. Daremoga sono kasegi ni taishi, hoshu o ukeru.
52|22|Mata ware wa kudamono, niku, sono soto kare-ra no nozomu mono o ataeyou.
52|23|Kare-ra wa soko de tagaini hai o kawasou. Sono tokini mo munashi hanashi ni fukeru koto naku, ranbo mo okasanai.
52|24|Kare-ra no shu ni wa, hime rareta shinju no yona kodomo ga kashizuite meguru.
52|25|Kare-ra wa tagaini chikayotte, tazune ai,
52|26|itte ita. `Izen, watashi-tachi wa kazoku no ma ni ite mo itsumo ki o nokotte ita.
52|27|Daga arra wa, watashi-tachi ni onmegumi o atae rare, neppu no chobatsu kara o sukui kudasa reta.
52|28|Izen kara watashi-tachi wa, kare ni inotte ita nodesu. Hontoni kare wa megumi atsuku, jihibukaki okata de ara reru'
52|29|sa, kare-ra ni kunkai shi nasai. Omo no onkei ni yotte, anata wa uranaishi demo kichigai demonai.
52|30|Mata kare-ra wa,`tada no shijinda. Kare no unsei ga gyakuten suru no o matou' to iu.
52|31|Gen tte yaru ga i. `Matte iruga i. Watashi mo anata gata to tomoni matte iyou.'
52|32|Ittai kare-ra no mazushi rikai-ryoku ga ko meijita no ka, soretomo kare-ra wa hogaina min'na no ka.
52|33|Matawa,`kare (muhanmado) ga kore o gisaku shita nodearu.' To iu no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa shinjite wa inai nodearu.
52|34|Moshi kare-ra no kotoba ga shinjitsunara, kore to onaji o tsuge o motte kosa seruga yoi.
52|35|Kare-ra wa mu kara tsukura reta node wanai ka. Soretomo kare-ra jishin ga sozo-shana no ka.
52|36|Soretomo kare-ra ga, ten to ji o sozo shita no ka. Iya, kare-ra ni wa shikkari shita shinko ga nai nodearu.
52|37|Soretomo kare-ra wa, anata no omo no samazamana takaramono o motte iru no ka. Matawa (jibutsu no) kanrishana no ka.
52|38|Soretomo kare-ra ni wa hashigo ga atte, sorede (ten ni nobori, sono himitsu o) kiku koto ga dekiru no ka. Sorenara kiita to iu mono ni, meikakuna shoko o motte kitasa seruga yoi.
52|39|Soretomo anata gata ni wa musuko ga atte, kare ni wa musume ga aru (dake) to iu no ka.
52|40|Soretomo anata ga, kare-ra ni hoshu o motome, sore de kare-ra wa fusai no omoni o otte iru to iu no ka.
52|41|Soretomo yugen-kai no koto ga sukkari wakatte ite, sore o kakitomete iru to iu no ka.
52|42|Soretomo (anata ni taishite) sakuwomegurasu tsumori ka. Daga haishin-sha-tachi koso, sakubo ni kakarudearou.
52|43|Soretomo kare-ra wa, arra igai ni kami ga aru to iu no ka. Arra ni tatae are, kare wa haisuru mono (jashin) no ue ni ito takaku ora reru.
52|44|Tatoe ten'noikkaku ga (kare-ra no ue ni) ochiru no o mite mo, kare-ra wa,`tsumikasanatta kumodesu.' To iudearou.
52|45|Kare-ra wa,(osore no tame ni) soko ni konto suru (shinpan no)-bi ni au made, hanatte oke.
52|46|Sonohi kare-ra no sakubo wa, nani no eki mo naku, kekkyoku kare-ra wa tasuke rarenaidearou.
52|47|Hontoni fugina okonai no mono ni wa, kono soto ni mo chobatsu ga aru. Daga, kare-ra no oku wa kidzukanai.
52|48|Sore de omo no sabaki o taeshinonde mate. Hontoni ware wa anata gata o mimamotte iru. Soshite anata ga tachiagaru toki wa,-nushi o tatae nasai.
52|49|Yonaka ni, mata shinshin ga shirizoku toki ni mo, kare o tatae nasai.
53|1|Shizumi yuku hoshi ni kakete (chikau).
53|2|Anata gata no doryo wa, mayotte iru node wa naku, mata machigatte iru node mo nai.
53|3|Mata (jibun no) nozomu koto o itte iru node mo nai.
53|4|Sore wa kare ni keiji sa reta, o tsuge nihokanaranai.
53|5|Narabinai iryoku no mochinushi ga, kare ni oshieta no wa,
53|6|sugureta chiryoku no mochinushidearu. Massugu ni tatte,
53|7|kare wa chihei no mottomo takai tokoro ni arawareta.
53|8|Sore kara orite kite, chikadzuita.
53|9|Oyoso yumi 2tsu, iya sore yori mo chikai kyorideatta ka.
53|10|Soshite shimo be (muhanmado) ni, kare no keiji o tsugeta.
53|11|Kokoro wa jibun ga mita koto o itsuwaranai.
53|12|Kare no mita koto ni tsuite, anata gata wa kare to ronso suru no ka.
53|13|Hontoni kare (muhanmado) wa, saido no koka ni oite mo, kare (jiburiru) o mita nodearu.
53|14|(Dare mo kosenai) 涯 Ni aru, su~idora ki no hata de.
53|15|Sono soba ni tsui no sumai no rakuen ga aru.
53|16|Ou mono ga su~idora ki o konmori to ou toki.
53|17|(Kare no) shisen wa suiyose rare, mata (bushitsuke ni)-do o sugosu koto mo nai.
53|18|Kare wa tashika ni,-nushi no o no shirushi o mita nodearu.
53|19|Anata gata wa, arrato to uzza o (nanidearu to) kangaeru ka.
53|20|Sore kara dai 3-banme no manato o.
53|21|Anata gata ni wa danshi ga ari, kare ni wa joshi ga aru to iu no ka.
53|22|Soredewa, hontoni futona wakekatadearou.

53|23|Sorera wa, anata gata ya sosen-tachi ga nadzuketa (tada no) namae ni suginai. Arra wa (don'na) ken'i o mo, sorera ni kudasa renakatta. Kare-ra (fushinjin-sha) wa, munashi okusoku ya shiyoku ni shitagatte iru nisuginai. Sudeni omo kara no michibiki ga, kare-ra ni kite irunoni.
53|24|Oyoso ningen ni wa, hoshimono wa nani demo te ni hairu no ka.
53|25|Iya, raise mo gense mo, arra no yudearu.
53|26|Ten ni ikaga ni tenshi ga ite mo, arra ga nozoma re, sono o yorokobi ni azukaru mono ni taisuru o yurushi ga deta nochidenakereba, kare-ra (tenshi) no torinashi wa nani no yaku ni mo tatanai.
53|27|Hontoni raise o shinjinai mono wa, tenshi ni josei no na o tsuke tari suru.
53|28|Kare-ra wa (nani no) chishiki mo naku, okusoku ni shitagau dakedearu. Daga shinri ni taishite wa, okusoku nado nani mo yakudatsu wake wanai.
53|29|Sorede anata wa ware no kunkai ni sewomukeru-sha, mata konoyo no seikatsu shika nozomanai mono kara tozakare.

53|30|Kono teido (gense no seikatsu) ga, kare-ra no chishiki no todoku genkaidearu. Hontoni omo wa,-do kara mayotte iru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru. Mata kare wa, michibiki o ukeru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru.
53|31|Hontoni ten ni ari-chi ni aru subete no mono wa, arra no yudearu. Dakara akugyo no itazurani wa fusawashi mukui o atae rare, mata zenko no itazurani wa saizen no mono de mukuwa reru.

53|32|Chisai go chi wa betsu to shite, taizai ya harenchina koi o yokeru mono ni wa,-nushi no yosha wa hontoni kodaidearu. Kare wa daichi kara tsukuridasa reta toki no anata gata ni tsuite, mata, anata gataga haha no tainai ni hisonde ita toki no anata gata ni tsuite, mottomo yoku shitte ora reru. Dakara, anata gata wa jibun de seijo butte wa naranai. Kare wa omo o osoreru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru.
53|33|Anata wa (shinri kara) somuki saru mono o mita ka.
53|34|Wazuka ni hodokoshi o shite wa,(-mono ka mi shite) tomeru.
53|35|Soiu mono ni yugen-kai no chishiki ga atte, sorede nani demo mieru to iu no ka.
53|36|Soretomo, musa no sho ni aru koto ga, tsuge rareta koto wa nai no ka.
53|37|Mata (yakusoku o) kanzen ni hatashita iburahimu no koto mo.
53|38|Omoni o ou mono wa, tanin no omoni o ou koto wa dekinai.
53|39|Ningen wa, sono doryoku shita mono igai, nani mo eru koto wa dekinai.
53|40|Sono doryoku (no seika) wa, yagate mitomerarerudearou.
53|41|Yagate hosho wa, jubun ni mukui rareru.
53|42|Hontoni anata no omoni koso, kichaku-sho wa aru.
53|43|Kare koso wa, warawase nakaseru okata.
53|44|Mata shina se, ikasu okatadearu.
53|45|Hontoni kare wa, otome no kumiawase o tsukura reta.
53|46|Sore mo seieki o fukikomu koto de.
53|47|Mata 2-dome no sozo (no fukkatsu) mo, kare no okokoro no mamadearu.
53|48|Kare koso wa toma se, mata michitari saseru okata.
53|49|Mata okami hoshi (Shiriusu) no omo mo kono okata.
53|50|Kare wa mukashi ado (no min) o horoboshi.
53|51|Mata samudo mo hitori nokosazu horobosa reta.
53|52|Sore izen ni nufu no min mo. Hontoni kare-ra wa, hidoi fugi, fusei no yakaradeatta.
53|53|Mata (sodomutogomora no yo ni) tenpuku sa reta sho toshi.
53|54|Soshite kare wa sore o oi sara reta.
53|55|(Hitobito yo,) ittai-nushi no dono o megumi ni, anata gata wa iron o daku no ka.
53|56|Kore wa, mukashi no keikoku-sha-tachi to onaji hitori no keikoku-shadearu.
53|57|(Shinpan no toki wa) chikaku ni sematte kite iru.
53|58|Sore wa arra no soto nanimono mo akiraka ni shi e enai.
53|59|Anata gata hako no hanashi o kiite odoroite iru no ka.
53|60|Chosho wa shite mo, nakanai no ka.
53|61|Anata gata wa, ji 惚 No naka de toki o sugosu no ka.
53|62|Ichizu ni arra ni sajida shi,(kare ni) tsukae nasai.
54|1|Toki wa chikadzuki, tsuki wa mijin ni saketa.
54|2|Kare-ra wa tatoe shirushi o mite mo, somuki satte,`koreha aikawarazu no majutsuda.' To iudearou.
54|3|Kare-ra wa (kunkai o) kyogidearu to shi, jibun no yokubo ni shitagatte kita. Daga issai no koto ni wa, sadame rareta ketsumatsu ga aru.
54|4|Kore made, samazamana shosoku wa, sudeni motarasa re, sorede jubun jisei dekita hazu.
54|5|Sore wa mezamashi eichideatta. Daga keikoku wa yakudatanakatta.
54|6|Dakara anata wa, kare-ra kara tozakare. Shoshu-sha ga kirawa reru tokoro e yobidasu hi.
54|7|Kare-ra wa me o fusete, chodo batta ga chirabaru yo ni hakaba kara dete kite,
54|8|shoshu-sha no kata ni isogu. Fushinjin-sha-tachi wa iu. `Kore wa dainan no hidesu.'
54|9|Kare-ra izen ni, nufu no min mo (sono yogen-sha o) kyogi to shi, waga shimo be o uso-tsuki yobawari shi,`kichigaidesu.' To itte tsuiho shita.

Daga kin'yoku no shudoin-sei wa, kare-ra ga jibun de tsukutta mono de, ware ga kare-ra ni sore o shiji shite wa inai. Arra no yorokobi o etai bakari ni shita kotodaga, kare-ra wa sore mo mamoraneba naranai yo ni wa mamotte inakatta. Sorede ware wa, kare-ra no naka no shinko suru mono ni wa hosho o ataeta. Daga kare-ra no oku no mono wa arra no okite ni somuku-sha-tachideatta.

57|28|Anata gata shinko suru mono yo, arra o osore, kare no shito o shinji nasai. Kare wa bai no jihi o sazuke, mata komyo o anata gata no tame ni moke, sorede (tadashi michi o) ayuma se, mata anata gata (no kako no zaigo) o yurusa reru. Hontoni arra wa kan'yo ni shite jihibukaku ara reru.

57|29|Arra no onkei o kare-ra ga sukoshi mo sayu dekinai koto o, mata onkei wa arra no ote no naka ni aru to iu koto o keiten'notami wa shiru ga i. Kare no o kokoronikanau-sha wa, sore o sazukaru. Hontoni arra wa idaina onkei no omodearu.
